title: Uzbek Ambassador calls on Minister for Defence Production
content:
RAWALPINDI Jul 03 (APP): Ambassador of Republic of Uzbekistan Alisher Tukhtaev called on Federal Minister for Defence Production, Muhammad Raza Hayat Harraj here Thursday.
The minister welcomed the dignitary and said that Pakistan greatly values its friendly relations with Uzbekistan, said a press release.
The visiting dignitary thanked the minister for sparing time and showed his government’s commitment to continue working with the government of Pakistan in all domains specially in defence industrial sector.
Both sides stressed the need to explore avenues for joint ventures in the field of defence industry.
Both sides also agreed to formulate a ” Roadmap of Defense Industrial Cooperation ” between the two brotherly countries which will be signed during the upcoming session of Joint Working Group planned in August this year in Tashkent, Uzbekistan.
